src_original: iti pulastyena madyaviśeṣatvena surāyā nirdiṣṭatvāt /  ataś ca madyamātre surāśabdaprayogo gauṇaḥ  / anye punaḥ paiṣṭyādiṣu tisṛṣu surāśabdasya rūḍhiṃ manyante /
anekatra surāśabdaprayogo dṛśyate tathāpi kutrānāditvam iti saṃdehe,
gauḍī mādhvī ca paiṣṭī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā / (MDh 11.95)  iti manuvacanād guḍamadhupiṣṭavikāreṣv anāditvanirdhāraṇāt tatraiva mukhyatvaṃ yuktam / na  cānekatra śaktikalpanā doṣaḥ,
